item.description:
Somerville Theatre is hosting the Etheria Film Festival, featuring "the best new short fantasy and science fiction films directed by women from all over the world."

The festival opens at 4pm with a free screening of "We Are All Cylons" (but you may need to reserve a ticket in advance to guarantee seating). This is followed at 5pm by a free reception. Short film screenings are divided into Fantasy shorts, starting at 7pm, and Sci-Fi shorts, which begin at 9pm; there is an intermission between them. Tickets are $10 for each individual shorts session, or for $15 you can come to the whole shebang. There is even a free after-party, taking place at Redbones (just around the corner in Davis Square) at 11pm! Plenty of opportunities for mingling :o)

Here are links for the line-up and to buy advance tickets; they will also be selling at the door (if it doesn't sell out before then!):

http://www.etheriafilmfestival.com/2012-lineup
http://allthingshorrorpresents.ticketleap.com/etheria-film-festival/

I (Cheryl) will be attending the entire festival. I put 3:30 as the start time, to allow fellow attendees time to assemble together before filing in and finding seats. Additional mingling arrangements can also be devised for the reception, intermission, and/or after-party as necessary.
item.name: Etheria Sci-fi/Fantasy Film Festival
